channel.title: Random Thoughts on Vedang Manerikar
channel.description: Recent content in Random Thoughts on Vedang Manerikar

item.title: Imagine Working in Engineering at Helpshift
item.description: Cross-posted from my interview published on Helpshift’s Medium blog Name: Vedang Manerikar Current Role: Principal Engineering Manager, Backend How long you have been with Helpshift?: 7 years What does your day-to-day at Helpshift look like? My day-to-day is unblocking people and getting things done! I review architecture, read code, enable customer service, help product guys understand the engineering pros and cons of their product decisions and prioritize work for maximum productivity.

item.title: Reboot.
item.description: Once upon a time I had a blog. Then one day I ran out of motivation, inclination, desire, drive, whatnot to post to that blog. I never really ran out of content though. At least, I think not.
